answer: Cosentyx's net sales in the immunology segment for the full year 2024, reported in common currency, were $5,509 million, representing a 12% increase compared to the full year 2023. In constant currency, this was $5,432 million, representing a 9% increase compared to the full year 2023. The change from full year 2023 to 2024 was a $1,079 million ($5,509M - $4,430M) or 25.1% increase, assuming a 1:1 currency conversion rate for the quick-acting calculation.
